DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The purpose of this study is to test whether NovoLog (insulin aspart) is a safe and at least as effective alternative to regular human insulin for the control of blood glucose after meals in women who develop diabetes during pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Insulin Aspart vs. Regular Human Insulin in Gestational Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Subjects older than 35 years old will be considered Gestational diabetes mellitus
